import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function HomeScreen(props) { const [name, setName] = useState([]); useEffect(async () => { await axios.get('http://13.233.98.188:8080/api/enquiry/all').then((res) => { setName(res.data); }) }, []) return ( <>
